<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />

  </info>
  <citation>
    <sort>
      <key variable="title"/>
      <key variable="author"/>
    </sort>

      <names variable="author">
        <name form="short"/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
